derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: modern Latin, from Latin mille 'thousand', on the pattern of biennium

encyclopedia.content: 电视剧 中文译名为《千年追凶》专辑 Millennium,千禧年。 世纪之交的时候，Backstreet Boys曾携着这片专辑向我们展示了最完美的千年演绎。 不愧为后街的巅峰之作，其中的经典曲目更是至今为人们所好。 专辑名称：Millennium 发行公司：Jive Records 发行时间：1999年 专辑简介： 首周销售发行即狂卖110万张；Billboard专辑榜十周冠军；截止到2001年此张专辑在全球范围内销售量已经超过3000万张 1999年5月，后街男孩发行了他们的《

entry.def: A millennium is a period of one thousand years, especially one which begins and ends with a year ending in '000', for example the period from the year 1000 to the year 2000.
Many people refer to the year 2000 as the Millennium .

example.ex: ...the cost of Millennium celebrations and festivals.
example.tran: 千禧年庆典与节日活动的费用

means.word_mean: 2. (New Testament) in Revelations it is foretold that those faithful to Jesus will reign with Jesus over the earth for a thousand years; the meaning of these words have been much debated; some denominations (e.g. Jehovah's Witnesses) expect it to be a thou
3. the 1000th anniversary (or the celebration of it)
